entries.title: Apple Loop: Exciting iPhone 15 Milestone, Surprise M2 Pro Results, iPhone’s Missing Apps

entries.title: Atlanta’s ‘Cop City’ Protests Explained: An Activist Slain By Police And Georgia’s State Of Emergency
entries.description: Days after Manuel Esteban Paez Terán was killed by police after allegedly shooting first, the city remains on high alert over protests sparked by “Cop City,” a planned training facility on land with a controversial history.

entries.title: Using Hybrid Cloud To Meet The Challenges Of Modernizing Data Architectures
entries.description: How, with hybrid cloud, in alignment with their multi-cloud implementations, organizations can continue to have their own private, on-premises IT infrastructure for their most mission critical data and systems, while also bringing in public cloud resource using a hybrid data architecture.

entries.title: Bizarre Bright Spiral In The Sky Spotted By Astronomers Identified
entries.description: The eerie flying spiral light spotted by the Japanese Subaru Telescope on Hawaii’s Mauna Kea came from the tail end of a SpaceX rocket.

entries.title: India’s Ultraviolette Electric Motorcycle Company Wows With Two Impressive Offerings
entries.description: India is the second-largest motorcycle market behind China, but electric models remain few and far between - and are usually imported. Now, Bangalore-based startup Ultraviolette is offering two high-tech models, one of which is for racing.

entries.title: Surprising Paint Compound Hints At Rembrandt’s Methods
entries.description: Researchers found a compound in Rembrandt’s “The Night Watch” that has never been detected in a finished painting before.

entries.title: WWE Next In Line Class 3 Features NFL QB’s Sister And 6-Foot-8-Inch Powerhouse Football Player
entries.description: The WWE’s third class from the Next-in-Line recruitment initiative has been revealed, and it is stacked with collegiate athletes set to try their hand as WWE Superstars.

entries.title: Trump Is Returning To Facebook – Should Measures Be Taken To Keep Him In Check?
entries.description: Trump had been banned from the platform following the insurrection on January 6th, 2021

entries.title: Should We Fight Climate Change Or Support Free Trade?
entries.description: The prices that consumers pay for many goods do not take into account the environmental harm generated in producing and transporting them. New regulations and tariffs in support of decarbonization are needed. But does that erode free trade?

entries.title: “Climate Tech Is The Fastest Growing Investment Vertical” Says Crowdfunding Platform Seedrs
entries.description: Seedrs was first launched in 2012, and its since helped startups raise a total of £2.3 billion, with 1,870 deals funded so far.

entries.title: 15 Traits And Practices Of An Effective Tech Leader

entries.title: Effects Of The Last Ice Age Glaciation Is Visible In American Crocodile DNA
entries.description: Sea levels — not varying temperatures nor changing salinities — drove the genetic isolation of American crocodile populations on each side of Panama

entries.title: The Keys To Effective Identity Security For 2023

entries.title: This Original Series Is 100% Focused On Circularity And Sustainable Design

entries.title: Satechi’s New Pro Hub Slim Is Ideal For Apple’s M2 MacBook
entries.description: This handy new Satechi Pro Hub Slim offers the essential connectivity for Apple's MacBooks made since 2017 including the new M2 model. It includes support for video over USB-C and data transfer speeds up to 40Gbps with the USB4 port.

entries.title: U.K. Hospital Fined $1 Million After Baby Death

entries.title: CES 2023: Matter — Unlocking The Smart Home

entries.title: Trying To Make Sense Of The DC Chaos: James Gunn, The DCEU And HBO Max
